mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product ( prod_key, prod_name, prod_price, prod_maker, prod_origin, prod_intro, prod_cnt, upload_date, category_key ) values ( #{prodKey}, #{prodName}, #{prodPrice}, #{prodMaker}, #{prodOrigin}, #{prodIntro}, #{prodCnt}, sysdate, #{categoryKey} )
insert into tbl_product_image ( img_key, img_nm, img_path, prod_key ) values ('im' || to_char(sysdate, 'yymmdd') || lpad(seq_product_image.nextval, 4, '0'), #{imgNm}, #{imgPath}, #{prodKey})
